arts.ttl: Cremonese vs Juventus – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Cremonese will host Juventus at the Stadio Giovanni Zini on Saturday, as the Bianconeri begin a new era under newly appointed manager Luciano Spalletti. The veteran coach has signed a deal until the end of the season which includes an automatic extension clause contingent on Champions League qualification. Spalletti replaces Igor Tudor, who was dismissed […] The post Cremonese vs Juventus – Match preview and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Juventus XI vs Cremonese – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Juventus travel to Cremonese for their first Serie A game under new manager Luciano Spalletti on Saturday evening. The former Italy coach has officially taken the helm at Juventus, signing a contract that runs until 30 June, 2026, with a potential extension if the team qualifies for the Champions League.
